skills.name: Treason
skills.description: [SP: 18][CD: 12s] Launches 6 homing missiles in a row, each dealing 200% ATK of Physical DMG to the target an nearby enemies in a small AOE. Hit enemies are stunned for 2.53s.

skills.name: Betrayer's Counter
skills.description: When attacked, gain a 49% chance of dealing 157% ATK of Physical DMG.
